name: sphingosine-1-phosphate receptor 3
other_names: G protein-coupled receptor, endothelial differentiation gene-3
summary: This gene encodes a member of the EDG family of receptors, which are G protein-coupled receptors. This protein has been identified as a functional receptor for sphingosine 1-phosphate and likely contributes to the regulation of angiogenesis and vascular endothelial cell function. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2008].
